body_html:
Hi @gautamkmr MKL-DNN is also linked at runtime, but different from cuDNN (where users need to install manually), MKL-DNN is automatically generated/put in TF build output directory.

Can you please list the size you see in TF_output_dir/tensorflow/libtensorflow*.so?
TensorFlow is probably not just one binary - which binary are you referring to?
